response.overview: The life of Noa Altman, a forgotten actress, changes from one end to the other after her husband Uri, a martial arts instructor, miraculously survived a stabbing attack. Following Uri's act of heroism, his survival institute becomes popular and in demand, and the world, which until recently seemed gray and hopeless, begins to brighten the couple's face. However, when Noa discovers cracks in the story of the attack, she is pushed into a deep moral crisis, and the lie becomes the only way to the truth.
response.title: שיטת אלטמן
